item.title: My story about mentorship and my career
item.description: The Practical Developer DevDiscuss one day got me thinking about mentorship and how it’s impacted my life. It doesn’t fit in a tweet or a thread of tweets so you get the story about how a mentorship gave me my entire career in security. This is going to be a bit stream of mind so give me a break on grammar and spelling :)
